metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1048 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was found that the AJP connector in undertow, as shipped in Jboss EAP 7.1.0.GA, does not use the ALLOW_ENCODED_SLASH option and thus allow the the slash / anti-slash characters encoded in the url which may lead to path traversal and result in the information disclosure of arbitrary local files.

criterions.comment: undertow package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
